room_title: Escape room "Bomb Squad" by Conundrum Workshop in Bowling Green
review: We did the Bomb Squad escape room. We escaped! it was so much fun! Will be back to try other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Bomb Squad" by Conundrum Workshop in Bowling Green
review: This made an awesome date night for my hubby and I with a couple of our friends! We all had a blast at our first escape room experience! The Bomb Squad room was challenging and extremely well-thought out... we are hooked and will definitely be back to try the other rooms!
